name: Regain Humanity
description:
This game was produced as part of a team project module. It's still somewhat under development, so, if you would like to help us out, please leave some feedback on it for us via this form (and please be as honest as you can about your thoughts on this game!): https://forms.gle/xdp3xG5sVVzSyrwy6 

----

Controls
  • Movement
    • Arrow keys OR WASD keys
  • Jumping
    • Z key OR spacebar
  • Attacking (as zombie)/Dashing (as human)
    • X key OR J key
  • Swapping forms
    • C key OR left shift
  • Pausing
    • Escape key
  • nb: the 'OR's indicate that either of those buttons can be used for that action.
Gameplay tips
  • Pressing C allows you to swap forms
    • The guage at the top of  the screen indicates whether you can or can't swap form
  • Zombie form
    • You are slower and unable to jump very far
    • Pressing X/J allows you to attack enemies
      • Attacking them grants some 'humanity' and half a dash charge
    • No passive draining of the 'humanity' meter
  • Human form
    • Faster, able to jump further
    • Pressing X/J can allow you to 'dash' forward, if there aren't any obstructions
      • assuming you have a dash charge available (visible next to your 'humanity' meter)
    • Running out of your 'humanity' meter will result in you turning back into a zombie
  • Taking damage
    • Taking damage will drain your 'humanity' meter
    • Taking any damage when it is empty = death
  • Endless mode info
    • Yes, it's endless, you will lose eventually.
    • The thing chasing you is faster than your top speed in zombie mode, and does have some rubberbanding. You will need to handle swapping between zombie form and human form in order to outrun it whilst being able to keep your humanity meter topped up enough to stay ahead of it.

----

And, once again, please leave some feedback on our feedback form (and don't feel afraid to be brutally honest , your responses are anonymous): https://forms.gle/xdp3xG5sVVzSyrwy6
